title: Saira Malik, Nuveen/TIAA, Most Bearish Among 5 Sto...
text:
https://community.morningstar.com/t5/Market-Insights/From-Barron-s-September-2-2019-Part-2/m-p/20401...

"[YBB Summary] Five strategists’ views on markets by the yearend; Lori Calvasina/ RBC Capital , Richard Lacaille/ State Street , Dubravko Lakos-Bujas/ JP Morgan , Saira Malik/ Nuveen [TIAA], Edward Yardini/ Yardini Research . Some wide ranges are due to uncertainties in trade [China, EU, Asia, Canada, Mexico], tariffs, the Fed, pre-election year actions, higher volatility, etc. Generally, most optimistic is Yardini and most pessimistic is Malik.

SP500: 2,700-3,100

SP500 EPS: $159-167

SP500 P/E: 17.0-18.6

US GDP Growth: 2.10%-2.40%

Fed Fund Rate: 1.50-1.75% or 1.75%-2.00% [1 or 2 cuts]

10-Yr Treasury Yield: 1.25%-2.15%"

CREF Stock co-portfolio managers Saira Malik and Stephanie Link regularly appear on CNBC. https://www.tiaa.org/public/investment-performance/crefvariableannuity/profile?ticker=268555492

YBB
